summary.span: 使用户结束放置折线批注。

span.span: Ends the user placement of a polyline annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法结束之前由方法调用启动的批注放置操作 。This method ends an annotation placement operation previously started by a method call. 不需要调用此方法，因为当最终用户输入所有必需的点时，放置将自动结束。You are not required to call this method, because placement will automatically end when an end user enters all required points. 但是，如果出于某种原因需要中止批注放置操作，则此方法很有用。However, it is useful when an annotation placement operation needs to be aborted for some reason.

summary.span: 获取或设置折线批注在运行时的路径点。

span.span: Gets or sets the path points of a polyline annotation at run time.

value.span: 具有折线形的 对象。

span.span: A object with the polyline shape.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 折线必须使用相对于批注对象的坐标，其中 (0，0) 表示左上角坐标， (100100) 表示批注的右下角坐标。A polyline must use coordinates relative to an annotation object, where (0,0) denotes the top-left coordinates and (100,100) denotes the bottom-right coordinates of the annotation. 如果你应改用属性，则在设计时无法访问此属性 。This property is not accessible at design time, when you should use the property instead.

value.span: 具有折线形的 对象。

span.span: An object with the polyline shape.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 折线必须使用相对于批注对象的坐标，其中 (0，0) 表示左上角坐标， (100100) 表示批注的右下角坐标。A polyline must use coordinates relative to an annotation object, where (0,0) denotes the top-left coordinates and (100,100) denotes the bottom-right coordinates of the annotation. 如果你应改用属性，则在运行时无法访问此属性 。This property is not accessible at run time, when you should use the property instead.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定是否应使用自由绘制模式放置批注。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether an annotation should be placed using the free-draw mode.

value.span: 如果应使用自由绘制模式放置批注，则为;否则为 。

span.span: if an annotation should be placed using free-draw mode; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法时，支持两种不同的放置模式 。Two different placement modes are supported when the method is called. 将 属性设置为以 `true` 从默认模式切换为自由绘制模式，这允许用户在移动鼠标光标时自由绘制。Set the property to `true` to switch from the default mode to free-draw mode, which allows the user to free draw while moving the mouse cursor. 若要允许用户自由绘制批注，还必须将 属性设置为 `true` 。To allow the user to free draw the annotation, you must also set the property to `true`.
